title: Claimed by the Greek
description: The one question Niko always asks himself after meeting any of the Greek women his mother finds acceptable is “Will she let me tie her up and spank her?” But the sight of Elena in his BDSM club not only sparked the flames of his desire but ignited the need to claim her.Elena’s night to experience her first sexual adventure into BDSM has turned into a nightmare with the name of Niko attached to it. She never imagined meeting anyone at the club that would recognize her, let alone the very man that’s become part of her own nightly erotic fantasies. She just hopes he doesn’t turn into her own Trojan horse.
author: Lena Lettas
